      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  SwipeDismissRecyclerViewTouchListener.DismissCallbacks
      The callback interface used by SwipeDismissRecyclerViewTouchListener to inform its client about a successful dismissal of one or more list item positions.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SwipeDismissRecyclerViewTouchListener

        public SwipeDismissRecyclerViewTouchListener(android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView recyclerView,
                                             SwipeDismissRecyclerViewTouchListener.DismissCallbacks callbacks)
        Constructs a new swipe-to-dismiss touch listener for the given list view.
        Parameters:
        recyclerView - The list view whose items should be dismissable.
        callbacks - The callback to trigger when the user has indicated that she would like to dismiss one or more list items.

    • Method Detail

      • setEnabled

        public void setEnabled(boolean enabled)
        Enables or disables (pauses or resumes) watching for swipe-to-dismiss gestures.
        Parameters:
        enabled - Whether or not to watch for gestures.

      • makeScrollListener

        public android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView.OnScrollListener makeScrollListener()
        Returns an AbsListView.OnScrollListener to be added to the ListView using AbsListView.setOnScrollListener(android.widget.AbsListView.OnScrollListener). If a scroll listener is already assigned, the caller should still pass scroll changes through to this listener. This will ensure that this SwipeDismissRecyclerViewTouchListener is paused during list view scrolling.

        See Also:
        SwipeDismissRecyclerViewTouchListener

      • onTouch

        public boolean onTouch(android.view.View view,
                       android.view.MotionEvent motionEvent)
        Specified by:
